content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <metadata> <idinfo> <citation> <citeinfo> <origin>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</origin> <pubdate>20150316</pubdate> <title>National Geospatial Data Asset (NGDA) NAIP Imagery</title> <pubinfo> <pubplace>Salt Lake City, Utah</pubplace> <publish>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</publish> </pubinfo> <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/arcgis/rest/services/NAIP</onlink> <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/arcgis/rest/services/NAIP/NAIP_Image_Dates/MapServer</onlink> <onlink>http://www.fsa.usda.gov/FSA/apfoapp?area=apfohome&subject=landing&topic=landing</onlink> <onlink>http://www.fsa.usda.gov/Internet/FSA_File/catalog.txt</onlink> <onlink>http://datagateway.nrcs.usda.gov/</onlink> <onlink>http://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?webmap=d7eb04e3a14343b39cdc3503f5037003</onlink> </citeinfo> </citation> <descript> <abstract>Provides the ArcGIS Rest Services URLs for the public facing, most current year 1-meter 4-band NAIP web services for the lower 48 states, served by USDA-FSA Aerial Photography Field Office. It also provides the URL for the seamline services, which provides the image dates and other pertinent information about the NAIP acquisition. In addition, there are reference points to how to download NAIP CCMs and how to order uncompressed NAIP digital ortho quarter quad tiles (DOQQs), historical NAIP, and other historical imagery dating back to 1955.</abstract> <purpose>To provide public information about the publicly available NAIP imagery available  as ArcGIS Server image services, dowloadable Compressed County Mosaics, and Digital Ortho Quarter Quads available for purchase.</purpose> </descript> <timeperd> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2015</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <current>Current as of 03-16-2015</current> </timeperd> <status> <progress>In Work</progress> <update>Annually</update> </status> <spdom> <bounding> <westbc>-131</westbc> <eastbc>-66.09</eastbc> <northbc>52.13</northbc> <southbc>24.76</southbc> </bounding> </spdom> <keywords> <theme> <themekt>NGDA Portfolio Themes</themekt> <themekey>National Geospatial Data Asset</themekey> <themekey>NGDA</themekey> <themekey>Imagery Theme</themekey> </theme> <place> <placekt>Geographic Names Information System</placekt> <placekey>"United States"</placekey> <placekey>US</placekey> <placekey>North America</placekey> <placekey>State</placekey> </place> </keywords> <accconst>None</accconst> <useconst> These services are for illustrative purposes only.  It is not suitable for surveying or engineering purposes, The Aerial Photography Field Office asks to be credited for derived products. </useconst> <ptcontac> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>apfo.sales@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </ptcontac> <browse> <browsen>http://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?featurecollection=http%3A%2F%2Fgis.apfo.usda.gov%2Farcgis%2Frest%2Fservices%2FNAIP%3Ff%3Djson%26option%3Dfootprints&supportsProjection=true&supportsJSONP=true</browsen> <browsed>ArcGIS Online REST endpoint content</browsed> <browset>JSON</browset> </browse> <native>Windows 7 Enterprise Version 6.1.7601 Service Pack 1 Build 7601, ESRI ArcGIS Desktop 10.2, ArcGIS Online</native> </idinfo> <dataqual> <logic>Information is based on the APFO public image server and NAIP contract information.</logic> <complete>None</complete> <posacc> <horizpa> <horizpar>N/A</horizpar> </horizpa> <vertacc> <vertaccr>N/A</vertaccr> </vertacc> </posacc> <lineage> <srcinfo> <srccite> <citeinfo> <origin>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</origin> <pubdate>2015</pubdate> <title>National Geospatial Data Asset (NGDA) NAIP Imagery</title> <onlink>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/arcgis/rest/services/NAIP</onlink> </citeinfo> </srccite> <srcscale>10</srcscale> <typesrc>Digital imagery service, digital vector layer, ArcGIS Server REST endpoint</typesrc> <srctime> <timeinfo> <sngdate> <caldate>2015</caldate> </sngdate> </timeinfo> <srccurr>APFO public image server - current NAIP image services</srccurr> </srctime> <srccitea>N/A</srccitea> <srccontr>Aerial Photography Field Office NAIP Public Image Services and ArcGIS Server web service imagery dates</srccontr> </srcinfo> <procstep> <procdesc>The NAIP public image services were created at APFO using ArcGIS desktop 10.2 by creating mosaic datasets from pre-processed and compressed digital orthophoto quarter quads.  The services are delivered and published currently as state based services.  The image dates are published as a web mapping service using vendor provided shapefiles of image acquisition polygons.</procdesc> <procdate>20141111</procdate> </procstep> </lineage> </dataqual> <spdoinfo> <indspref>"US",</indspref> <direct>Vector</direct> <rastinfo> <rasttype>Pixel</rasttype> </rastinfo> </spdoinfo> <spref> <horizsys> <planar> <mapproj> <mapprojn>WGS 84 Web Mercator Auxiliary Sphere</mapprojn> <mapprojp></mapprojp> </mapproj> <planci> <plance>coordinate pair</plance> <coordrep> <absres>0.1</absres> <ordres>0.1</ordres> </coordrep> <plandu>meters</plandu> </planci> </planar> <geodetic> <horizdn>WGS 84</horizdn> <ellips>WGS 1984</ellips> <semiaxis>6378137</semiaxis> <denflat>298.257</denflat> </geodetic> </horizsys> </spref> <eainfo> <overview> <eaover> The image service layer:  NAIP Public Image Services contains the following fields and attributes -  OBJECTID ( type: esriFieldTypeOID , alias: OBJECTID )  - standard ESRI attribute primary key Shape ( type: esriFieldTypeGeometry , alias: Shape ) - Standard ESRI geometry field Name ( type: esriFieldTypeString , alias: Name , length: 50 ) - Image name to include overview names at smaller scales and image names at larger scales Category ( type: esriFieldTypeInteger , alias: Category ) - Mosaic dataset category Year_ts ( type: esriFieldTypeSmallInteger , alias: Year_ts ) - Year of imagery ST ( type: esriFieldTypeString , alias: ST , length: 2 )  - State QQNAME ( type: esriFieldTypeString , alias: QQNAME , length: 10 ) - Quarter Quad Name QQDATE ( type: esriFieldTypeDate , alias: QQDATE , length: 8 ) - Quarter Quad Date iDate_ts ( type: esriFieldTypeDate , alias: iDate_ts , length: 8 ) - Majority date of Quarter Quad image </eaover> <eadetcit>The attribute values were derived from information from the APFO public image services.</eadetcit> </overview> </eainfo> <distinfo> <distrib> <cntinfo> <cntperp> <cntper>APFO Sales Department</cntper> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntperp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>apfo.sales@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </distrib> <resdesc>ArcGIS Server Image Services and map services</resdesc> <distliab> In no event shall the creators, custodians, or distributors of this information be liable for any damages arising out of its use (or the inability to use it). </distliab> <stdorder> <digform> <digtinfo> <formname>ArcGIS Server Image Services, Digital Vector map service, Arcgis Online Map</formname> <formcont>N/A</formcont> </digtinfo> <digtopt> <onlinopt> <computer> <networka> <networkr>http://gis.apfo.usda.gov/arcgis/rest/services/NAIP</networkr> </networka> </computer> </onlinopt> <offoptn> <offmedia>N/A</offmedia> <recfmt>N/A</recfmt> </offoptn> </digtopt> </digform> <fees>N/A</fees> </stdorder> </distinfo> <metainfo> <metd>20141110</metd> <metc> <cntinfo> <cntorgp> <cntorg>USDA-FSA-APFO Aerial Photography Field Office</cntorg> </cntorgp> <cntaddr> <addrtype>mailing and physical address</addrtype> <address>2222 West 2300 South</address> <city>Salt Lake City</city> <state>Utah</state> <postal>84119-2020</postal> <country>USA</country> </cntaddr> <cntvoice>801-844-2900</cntvoice> <cntemail>kent.williams@slc.usda.gov</cntemail> </cntinfo> </metc> <metstdn>Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata</metstdn> <metstdv>FGDC-STD-001-1998</metstdv> </metainfo> </metadata>
